titles.title: Don't Track Me Act
To prohibit the replacement of the gasoline excise tax with a GPS, location or distance-based tax and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the Committee on Energy and Commerce, and in addition to the Committees on Ways and Means, and Transportation and Infrastructure, for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned.
Referred to House Energy and Commerce
Referred to House Ways and Means
Referred to House Transportation and Infrastructure
